title: SD Podcast Number 23 - A discussion with Mark Salter, Security Dialogue Editor
description: SD Podcast Number 23: In this special episode, we talk with Mark Salter, the editor of  Security Dialogue, about the journal’s past year and its plans for the year of its 50th anniversary in 2019. We also discuss the challenges and opportunities within contemporary academic publishing and Mark offers advice for prospective contributors to Security Dialogue.  Hosted by Antoine Bousquet.
